name: 黃秀英
objective:
Pre-requisite 先修課程：3001011 or approved by the course instructor. 
Course Contents: Force, mass and acceleration, particle kinematics, particle dynamics, work and energy, impulse and momentum, rigid body motion, and dynamics of rigid body system.
課程內容: 力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。

3)     Kinetics of Particles: Newton’s Second Law

5)     Kinetics of Particles: Energy and Momentum Methods
6)     Kinetics of Particles: Energy and Momentum Methods
7)     Kinetics of Particles: Energy and Momentum Methods &
Systems of Particles
8)     Systems of Particles

10)    Kinematics of Rigid Bodies

14)    Plane Motion of Rigid Bodies: Energy and Momentum Methods
15)    Plane Motion of Rigid Bodies: Energy and Momentum Methods
